items.name: On Get in touch page sending a message must be possible.
'-Register' and '-Login' functions - These tests covers the validation of features accessible directly from https://lennertamas.github.io/roxo/index.html url. Also verifies the url is correct.
When on landing page, the 'Home' button must navigate to the correct url.

'Profile page' functions - These tests covers the validation of features accessible directly from https://lennertamas.github.io/roxo/profile url. Such as change profile, delete profile functions. Also verifies the url is correct.

'Terms and conditions' functions - These tests covers the validation of 'Terms and conditions' functions features accessible directly from https://lennertamas.github.io/roxo/index.html url. Also verifies the url is correct.
A username and password is given. This test verifies login is successful with the given login credentials.
When on landing page, the 'About' button must navigate to the correct url.
When on landing page, the 'Get in touch' button must navigate to the correct url.
